refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: idmef_value_new_enum ()
idmef_value_new_enum_from_string ()
idmef_value_new_enum_from_numeric ()
idmef_value_new_from_string ()
idmef_value_set_enum ()
idmef_value_set_enum_from_numeric ()
idmef_value_set_enum_from_string ()
idmef_value_iterate ()
idmef_value_iterate_reversed ()
idmef_value_match ()
refsect2.para: Match val1 and val2 using op.

listitem.simpara: the number of match, 0 for none, a negative value if an error occured.

refsect2.title: idmef_value_check_operator ()
refsect2.para: Check whether op can apply to value.

listitem.simpara: Type of operator to check value for.
0 on success, a negative value if an error occured.

refsect2.title: idmef_value_get_applicable_operators ()
refsect2.para: Store all operator supported by value in result.

listitem.simpara: Pointer where the result will be stored.
0 on success, a negative value if an error occured.

refsect2.title: idmef_value_destroy ()
refsect2.para: Decrement refcount and destroy value if it reach 0.
